title: Fully furnished studio in a prime location, 19m2
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Fully furnished and totally renovated studio for rent in the 3rd district, a minute walk from rue de Bretagne and Square du Temple.
Fully equipped kitchen. Bathroom with a bathtub and WC. Brand new sofa/double bed, very comfy.
2 large windows.
LOTS OF LIGHT. VERY SUNNY.
Total space 19m2.
3rd floor walk-up.
780 euros per month including building charges and water.
Real-estate agency fee to be paid on top of the rent (one time fee).

To schedule a visit, please contact us via WhatsApp on +33663087837 or send us an email on Craigslist.
